backend/main.mo: Motoko backend actor managing user profiles and appointment requests with access control, validation, and admin-only request retrieval.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing implemented features, associated files, components, and test IDs for the project.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing high-level summaries of all frontend source files for reference.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base and theme variable definitions using OKLCH color tokens with light/dark mode support.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router with routes for all site pages using SiteLayout as the root layout.
frontend/src/components/BrandSections.ts: Provides styled ScriptureBlock and EventHighlight components for branded content sections.
frontend/src/components/LeadershipAvaila: Static availability calendar component with legend, styled grid, and a note about appointment confirmation.
frontend/src/components/PageSection.tsx: Reusable section wrapper supporting backgrounds, padding control, and optional id for anchors.
frontend/src/components/PrimaryCtas.tsx: Renders primary CTA buttons with layout variations for header, hero, and mobile contexts.
frontend/src/components/SiteFooter.tsx: Renders the site footer with about text, navigation links, contact link, and a bottom bar with credits.
frontend/src/components/SiteLayout.tsx: Defines the main page layout including navigation, routed content, and footer.
frontend/src/components/SiteNav.tsx: Implements responsive site navigation with active link highlighting and mobile menu support.
frontend/src/components/Typography.tsx: Exports styled typography components for titles and body text.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, refreshing queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides context and hooks for managing Internet Identity authentication and login state.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Contains React Query hooks for appointment requests and user profile operations using the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers, theme variables, and custom utility classes for site styling.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the app with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/ConnectPage.tsx: Renders the Connect page with service times, location details, live stream section, and social media prompts.
frontend/src/pages/GatheringAt6Page.tsx: Renders an event page describing The Gathering at 6, including time, location, schedule, and what attendees can expect.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Defines the homepage with a hero section, welcome message, core values, and calls to action.
frontend/src/pages/LeadershipGovernanceP: Displays leadership structure, details about the Presiding Prelate, availability, and governance framework.
frontend/src/pages/MinistriesPage.tsx: Lists key ministries offered by the church and encourages users to get involved.
frontend/src/pages/OurMissionPage.tsx: Explains the church’s mission to connect, empower, and extend outreach, with supporting sections.
frontend/src/pages/OutreachPage.tsx: Outlines the church’s community outreach efforts and ways they serve through compassion, resources, and events.
frontend/src/pages/ScheduleMeetingPage.t: Implements an authenticated appointment request form with validation, date/time handling, and request submission via a mutation hook.
frontend/src/pages/VisitPage.tsx: Displays visitor information with sections describing what to expect, featuring icons, descriptions, and navigation links.
frontend/src/pages/WhoWeArePage.tsx: Provides mission and belief statements using structured sections detailing values, purpose, and ministry focus.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters using query strings, hash routing, and sessionStorage.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration defining theme extensions, brand colors, fonts, utilities, and plugin setup.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing goals, features, requirements, versioning, and image needs for the KMI church website.
